text: Angela Bettis (born January 9, 1973) is an American movie, television, and stage actress. She was born in Austin, Texas. In the 2002 telefilm Carrie, Angela, Jodelle Ferland and the baby replaced Sissy Spacek for being Carrie. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors category:American television actors Category:Actors from Austin, Texas Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Angela Bettis
